body_html:
Thanks @drpngx, you are right, it is quadratic in num_classes.
I somehow expected numpy to be smarter with diagonal matrices, but it actually allocates the whole matrix on initialization.
PR makes no sense then, closing it.

body:
Thanks @drpngx, you are right, it is quadratic in `num_classes`.
I somehow expected numpy to be smarter with diagonal matrices, but it actually allocates the whole matrix on initialization.
PR makes no sense then, closing it.
